Judul: DEVELOPING STARTUP INVESTMENT STRATEGY FOR AVREGO
Abstrak:
AVREGO have a plan to raise capital due to negative cash flow and still develop an AR platform. Lack of knowledge about startup investment which impact for no preparation while raise capital to investors. In the other side, startup ecosystem in Indonesia still new, itÃ‚Â’s challenging for founder to running startup at Indonesia. To get better understanding about issue and challenge to raise capital by startup and investor startupÃ‚Â’s insight about strategy investment in startup, author collect data by questionnaire and structure interview approach. 23 startup and 10 institutional investment (Ventura Capital, Corporate Ventura Capital, and angel investment) already fulfill questionnaire and interviewed. And also to collect current condition of startup ecosystem Indonesia and literature about startup investment.      

After collect data and analysis the result of questionnaire to investors and startup and structured interview to investors (Venture Capital and Corporate Venture Capital), author develop a startup investment framework by considering a type of investors ( funding options), life stage of startup ( ideation, prototype, early stage, market expansion and market dominance) and internal and external criteria of startup (product/services, business model, founders/team, investable, market size and partnership). Each criteria already defined by detail in each level of startup. Startup investment framework as guidance for develop strategy to raise capital for AVREGO.     

According to startup investment framework, author develop startup investment strategy by determine the                     actions for each criteria as proper the current status of AVREGO. And also milestones of AVREGO.
Kata Kunci: Startup, Funding Options, Investment, Framework, Internet Technology
